long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ads have gotten out of control - while we can't completely block ads as well as before with the new updates to YouTube, this extension will provide the ability to auto-skip the ads (either after 5 seconds or sometimes instantly)

What you get :
⭐ Skip Youtube Ads after 5 seconds - can wait for 5 seconds and automatically skip the remainder of the ad for you
⭐ Skip YouTube Ads all together - sometimes, will skip the entire ad
⭐ Stealth - not detected by anti ad block

Automatically clicks on the 'skip ads' button within Youtube™ videos.

Details:
- Only works on youtube.com.
- Just install it and the auto-clicking is enabled. No configuration needed.
- Tested that it blocks 100% of ads
- Does not work on non-skippable ads.

 About

In some cases it's not possible to skip a Youtube video ad, sorry about that.
It is free to download and use!
